publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/06/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To 18 1/2 lbs. fresh Pork 6x pr. lb
By work from the 6th of March
By less on House rent for the
To rent of Farm to 31st March 1843
" 8 Yds Calico at Boston not before chd.
To use of the J. Freeman House to
April 1st 1844 to be paid in highway
work at 50x on the Dollar at $25 00
To Soap dld. by Mr Carver
